body:
Great plot and the sex shots are amazing, I really love Love Live! doujins with dark takes/realities that breaks the stereotypical "Idols are cute and pure" and it kind of reflects how fucked up the shithole called Idol Industry can be.
It would be a 10/10 if it wasn't for the shitty art style with oversized tits, still fapable tho 6/10
That's.... Dark Side of the Idol World for you. lol
Disgusting. Look what they did to my girls
